Class OFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • OFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>

    public class OFile
extends java.io.File
    OFile Opens file to read/write efficiently and intuitively.
    Since:
    August 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.File

        pathSeparator, pathSeparatorChar, separator, separatorChar

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Clears contents of file.

      Closes BufferedWriter instance.

      Creates and opens BufferedWriter instance, closing BufferedReader instance if necessary.

      Reads a single line from file as string.
      java.lang.String readFile()
      Reads whole file super-efficiently as string.

      Writes string to file

      Writes string to file with specific appending mode (remembers appending mode in subsequent calls).
